item.title: My New Website is Live!
item.description: Hey there, amazing folks! You probably noticed by now, but if you didn’t: I now have a website! I’m Niro and I had the privilege of making a difference in people’s lives (and their families lives!) through caregiving. What’s planned for the website, you ask? Interesting reads: I’ll be sharing articles about caregiving. Heartfelt stories: Get ready for some personal stories from my time as a PSW. Useful tools and websites about caregiving.

item.title: About me
item.description: I truly believe that compassionate care is at the heart of caregiving. I genuinely care and treat every client with the respect, dignity, and kindness they deserve. Life can be unpredictable, and I understand that. I have a flexible schedule to accommodate client’s lifestyle and evolving needs.

item.title: My skills
item.description: Personal care Bathing, dressing, grooming, and mobility Medication management and administration Meal preparation Specialized care Tailored services for clients with specific medical conditions. Alzheimer’s care Hospice care Dementia care EMR systems Mobility Assisting with errands, medical appointments, and grocery shopping. Housekeeping Light housekeeping and maintaining a clean and safe living environment Laundry
